VoiceDir3.EDC76: Realizes his brother has been tricking everyone and has been passing off a fake horn. Outraged.
Line3.EDC76: Wait a second. This looks nothing like Maric’s. Why, that lying bastard! I bet he’s been parading around a goat horn. Ach, I’m gonna kill him!
VoiceDir1.EDC76: Happy drunk, but still coherent. Very pleased with himself.
Line1.EDC76: Oi! You got one! Ain't that a beaut. This will show that smug bastard.
